description: The CAC is a collaboration of Safe & Sound, the City and County of San Francisco and UCSF. It provides support for victims of child abuse and their families. It ensures children have the help and guidance they need to heal from the trauma they experienced, and that families receive the services they need to create a safe future without abuse. The CAC is for victims of physical, sexual, emotional abuse, and neglect. The San Francisco Children's Advocacy Center is a Multidisciplinary Interview Cen

howToGetIt: Drop in or Call 24 hrs for intake interview. Phone: (628) 206-8386 - During business hours, you will speak with a CASARC intake nurse. - After business house, a CASARC nurse will return your call as soon as possible.
cost: There is no charge for crisis intervention and referral, either by phone or in person. There is no charge for the emergency medical exam following sexual assault
agency: Child and Adolescent Support, Advocacy & Resource Center (CASARC) SFGH
